revised_title: Investigations on Nagana, the Tsetse Fly Disease, and its Hematozoan Parasite
tldr: The authors study the Tsetse Fly Disease, also known as Nagana, and its hematozoan parasite. They investigate the susceptibility of various animals to the disease, its duration, and methods of transmission. The study aims to understand the disease and explore potential methods of prevention, cure, or immunization.
